title.native: BLEACH The DiamondDust Rebellion もう一つの氷輪丸
title.romaji: BLEACH: The DiamondDust Rebellion - Mou Hitotsu no Hyourinmaru
title.english: Bleach the Movie: The DiamondDust Rebellion

description:
A valuable artifact known as "King's Seal" ("Ouin") is stolen by a mysterious group of people during transport in the Soul Society. Toshiro Hitsugaya, the 10th Division Captain of Gotei 13, is assigned to transport the seal, fights the leader of the group, and shortly after, goes missing. After the incident, the Seireitei declares Hitsugaya a traitor and orders the capture and execution of Hitsugaya. Ichigo Kurosaki refuses to believe this, and along with Rangiku Matsumoto, Rukia Kuchiki, and Renji Abarai, swears to uncover the real mastermind of the stolen seal, find Hitsugaya, and clear his name. Meanwhile, a rogue Hitsugaya searches for the perpetrators and uncovers a dark secret regarding a long dead shinigami.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Bleach: The Diamond Dust Rebellion - Another Hyourinmaru
Bleach: The Movie 2: The DiamondDust Rebellion

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShiroSAGISU_twi)

__Non-Anime Credits:__ 
- Music composer for ''Neon Genesis Evangelion'' (N64, VG) (Japanese) 
- Music composer for ''Shining Force Neo'' (VG)
- Music composer for ''Attack on Titan (live-action movie)''
- Music composer for'' Attack on Titan II: End of the World (live-action movie)''
- Music composer for ''Shin Godzilla''
- Music composer for ''Shin Ultraman''

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kudo_M_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kudo_m_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVcxdd04vCuhr-1t7mDh3gg)

[Official Site](https://www.sambomaster.co) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sambomaster_txt)

**Sambomaster** is a Japanese rock band signed by Sony Music Japan.  Trivia: The band's name, Sambomaster, refers to the Russian martial art called Sambo.

Members:

- Takashi Yamaguchi  (山口隆) - Lead Vocals, Guitar
- Yasufumi Kiuchi (木内泰史) - Drums, Chorus
- Yoichi Kondou (近藤洋) - Bass, Chorus
**Shimizu Tomoyuki (清水友幸)** is a Japanese art director and background artist.
**Shimizu Tomoyuki (清水友幸)** is a Japanese art director and background artist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大西雅也)

Long-time key member of [Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/studio/1/). Married to [Takako Oonishi](https://anilist.co/staff/139180/).
